Description:
Education, Qualifications & Experiences

You should have ideally a high school qualification with previous experience in a related discipline. You must have a good command of English and Computer skills are of an advantage.

Knowledge & Competencies

The ideal candidate will be helpful, courteous and with a positive attitude. You have the ability to perform with high standard of social skills enabling you to interact and deal with other colleagues effectively. You portray a fair, friendly style and be easily approachable for associates, while possessing following additional competencies:

Understanding the Job
Taking Responsibility
Recognizing Differences
Customer Focus
Adaptability
TeamworkJob Details
